from fastai2.basics import *
from transformers import AutoTokenizer
from fastai_transformers_utils.all import *

from nmt_try.models.patch import *
from nmt_try.models.qrnn2qrnn import *
from nmt_try.data.tatoeba import *
from nmt_try.metrics import compute_bleu

# all_slow

tok_data_loc = './test_data/tok_cmn.csv'
enc_model_name = 'hfl/chinese-bert-wwm-ext'
dec_model_name = 'distilgpt2'
enc_seq_len = 50
dec_seq_len = 40

enc_tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(enc_model_name)
dec_tokenizer = GPT2DecoderTokenizer.from_pretrained(dec_model_name)

Full Test of QRNN2QRNN¶

Datasets¶

small_dss = get_tatoeba_dss(tok_data_loc, enc_tokenizer, dec_tokenizer, enc_seq_len, dec_seq_len, pct=0.2)
dss = get_tatoeba_dss(tok_data_loc, enc_tokenizer, dec_tokenizer, enc_seq_len, dec_seq_len)
len(small_dss.train), len(dss.train)

Model¶

enc_vocab_size = len(enc_tokenizer)
enc_pad_id = enc_tokenizer.pad_token_id

dec_vocab_size = len(dec_tokenizer)
dec_pad_id = dec_tokenizer.pad_token_id

embeded_size = 256
num_encoder_layers = 2
num_decoder_layers = 2
drop_p = 0.1

%xdel qrnn2qrnn
%xdel decoder
%xdel encoder
encoder = QRNNEncoder(enc_vocab_size, embeded_size, enc_pad_id, num_encoder_layers, drop_p)
decoder = QRNNDecoder(dec_vocab_size, embeded_size, dec_pad_id, num_decoder_layers, drop_p)
qrnn2qrnn = QRNN2QRNN(encoder, decoder, num_encoder_layers, num_decoder_layers)

Learner and Train¶

%xdel dls
%xdel learn
dls = small_dss.dataloaders(bs=128)
# dls = dss.dataloaders(bs=128)
learn = Learner(dls, 
                qrnn2qrnn, 
                loss_func=CrossEntropyLossFlat(ignore_index=dec_pad_id), 
                opt_func=Adam,
                metrics=[accuracy, Perplexity()],
                cbs=[QRNN2QRNNCallback()],
               ).to_fp16()

learn.fit_one_cycle(1, 1e-2)
epoch train_loss valid_loss accuracy perplexity time
0 6.615591 4.499714 0.058343 89.991379 00:09 
# learn.fit_one_cycle(3, 1e-2)
epoch train_loss valid_loss accuracy perplexity time
0 5.010503 3.980145 0.081172 53.524818 00:47
1 3.416609 3.080143 0.102081 21.761518 00:47
2 2.456870 2.930123 0.107268 18.729927 00:47

Bleu¶

generated_qrnn2qrnn = GeneratedQRNN2QRNN(qrnn2qrnn, enc_tokenizer, dec_tokenizer)
generate_args = GenerateArgs(   
    max_length=20,
#     do_sample=True,
    num_beams=1,
    temperature=1.0,
    repetition_penalty=1,
    length_penalty=1.0,
)

compute_bleu(generated_qrnn2qrnn, generate_args, dec_tokenizer, dls.valid)
100.00% [34/34 00:16<00:00] 
0.07617610133876566

Generate¶

generate_args = GenerateArgs(   
    max_length=20,
#     do_sample=True,
    num_beams=3,
    temperature=1.0,
    repetition_penalty=1,
    length_penalty=1.0,
)
generated_qrnn2qrnn = GeneratedQRNN2QRNN(qrnn2qrnn, enc_tokenizer, dec_tokenizer)

src_strs = ['你确定？', 
            '找到汤姆。', 
            '帮帮我们吧！',
            '坚持。']
tgt_strs = ["Really?",
           "Get Tom.",
           "Help us.",
           "Hold on."]
result = generated_qrnn2qrnn.generate_from_strs(src_strs, generate_args, device='cuda:0')
result

['How are you?',
 'Tom is coming to Tom.',
 "Let's take us to help us.",
 'The dog is ended.']
src_strs = ['我很高興再次見到你。', 
            '我有點累。', 
            '我不記得寄過信了。',
            '它是我兄弟的。']
tgt_strs = ["I'm very glad to see you again.",
           "I'm a little tired.",
           "I don't remember mailing the letter.",
           "It's my brother's."]
result = generated_qrnn2qrnn.generate_from_strs(src_strs, generate_args, device='cuda:0')
result

["I'm glad to see you again.",
 'I have a lot.',
 "I don't remember any letter.",
 "It's my favorite brother."]
